reviews.name: The Strangers (Unrated) (Blu-ray) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText:
This is one of the better real horror stories because it can happen to anyone. I rented this when it first came out on dvd and was scared to death. After buying the Blu-Ray, I can't watch it alone or with someone. The whole premise scares the shoe out of me. It seems too real and if you watch it alone, late at night, in the dark and hear a knock at your door, DO NOT ANSWER IT!
I MEAN IT!!!!!!
reviews.title: NO BRAINIER, PICK ONE UP, UNDER $10?? WOW!!!

reviews.name: The Strangers (Unrated) (Blu-ray) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: Its been a long time since a really good scary movie has come out. This is a real chiller and nail biter!!! You'll have a spooky time. Not a very gory movie either.
reviews.title: KimmyShimmy

reviews.name: The Strangers (Unrated) (Blu-ray) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: I agree with Kimmy! This movie was the epitome of entertainment! The screenplay was well written, and the characters were fantastically believable. I like how the relationships were much different from the typical horror/suspense film. I'd recommend this to own, even if you've yet to see it!!!
reviews.title: Awesomeness.

reviews.name: The Strangers (Unrated) (Blu-ray) (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: The best true horror movie since the original Halloween, in my opinion. It focuses on suspense and terror instead of gore, my idea of a true horror movie. It has no gore and few cuss words and all suspense and on the edge of your seat scenes. GREAT BUY
reviews.title: GREAT. Buy It.
